response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with our flagship product, which I believe has the potential to significantly impact and benefit your business. Given its unique features and capabilities, I estimate its value to be well above $15,000. Considering its high quality and the exclusive access it offers, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product for $20,000. This price reflects not only its intrinsic value but also the strategic advantage it could provide for your company. I trust that you will find this investment worthwhile for your business growth and success. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of working with you.", "product_price": 20000}
